toc.envision_location: Eiffel ENViSioN!\Developing with Eiffel ENViSioN!\Adding a New Project\Advanced GUI Project Wizard\Interface Construction Page\How To's

paragraph.paragraph:
An EiffelBuild
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object is a representation of a Vision2 component and its properties.

To create a new instance of an object,
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop pick a type from the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/30_type_selector/index type selector and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop drop onto an existing
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object (Accessible from the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index layout constructor or
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/60_builder_window/index builder window ). You will only be able to complete the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#pick_and_drop drop if the targeted
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object will accept a new object of the transported type.
paragraph.note:
Note: Once an
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object has been
/tools/eiffelbuild/how_to_s/20_create_an_object/index created , it will always be contained in a parent
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.html#object object until
/tools/eiffelbuild/how_to_s/30_delete_an_object/index deleted .
